Compared to the other options, flying, commuting, and going home are not directly related to the question. Flying might be relevant if you live far away from work and need to travel a long distance, but it doesn't answer why you would take a bus specifically to get to work. Commuting is also not directly related to the question, as it refers to the daily travel between home and work. Going home is also not relevant, as it refers to the end of the workday. Therefore, the only option that is directly related to the question is "Travel".
